Comments_List: After a full semester of reading Swahili literary works I learned how to analyze them and relate them to contemporary events in my home society of Tanzania and Africa at large.
Yes, as long as they have good Swahili efficiency then this class will introduce new literature and challenge them to engage with it and relate it to things in their societies.
